title: Visting San Jose/Santa Cruz First Week of Sept.
content:
I will be visiting the west coast for a long Labor Day weekend. If anyone would like to meet up to chat about type, designing fonts, open source, art, typosium, snarks, design or anything else interesting, just send me a message. In return, I'll buy the first round of coffee or beer! Sun or Mon is best. If I can fit it in, I'd love an excuse to visit SF.

You can email me through choz at exclamachine dot com, or pop a message through typophile if I am on.
author: Choz Cunningham

comments.content:
Sounds like a plan!

Just remember, for anyone coming to the SF Bay Area, the Bay Bridge between San Francisco and Oakland will be closed over the entire Labor Day holiday weekend (8 p.m. Friday, August 31, 2007 — 5 a.m. Tuesday, September 4, 2007), so plan travel routes accordingly. [Detour Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818113557/http:/511.org/promo/baybridge/default.asp)
